My details

To save yourself time when you visit us, you can complete your hospital registration forms in advance and keep your account settlement information up to date.

  • Overview
  • MySpire account
  • Patient details
  • Payment
  • Communication preferences
Communication Preferences

We may contact you by email, SMS or phone about your booking. If we try to contact you by phone (mobile and / or landline) and you are not available, we may leave you a voicemail message. We may also use your details to contact you about patient surveys we use for improving our service or monitoring outcomes, which are not a form of marketing.

Please tick the box(es) if you are happy for Spire to contact you with basic administrative information such as appointment information:

Marketing information - Spire would like to provide you with marketing information about products and services offered by Spire and by selected third - party partners. If you do not consent for us to process your personal data for marketing activities, we will still be able to contact you about your appointment.

Please tick the box(es) to confirm your consent to receive marketing information from Spire:

Cancel Confirm
